channel.title: No option to reconnect after crash
channel.description: #### What happened? Game crashed, restart did not show an option to rejoin the game. #### What was SUPPOSED to happen? A big glowy Rejoin button should have obliged me to rejoin the game I crashed from. #### Steps to reproduce: 1. Crash 2. Restart game 3. Cry longing for a button #### Comments: Can be very annoying if Unseen just landed a convert on you, cause it looks like a throw or a rage quit while I am simply **unable** to get back in.error.log (51.1 KB) output_log.txt (589.1 KB)

item.title: No option to reconnect after crash
item.dc:creator: Htm
item.description:
Erik:

Same here. 2 of 2 games tonight I crashed during loading, and 2 of 2 times I opened the game back up and was not prompted to reconnect.

Prior to 1.1.0 I was able to reconnect every time, but since that patch, it never gives me the option. I really hope I’m not the subject of several reports because the reconnect feature is broken…

Yeah I was worried too but according to a dev, they know whether you crash or you just left

item.title: No option to reconnect after crash
item.dc:creator: laxentis
item.description:
What happened?

Game crashed, restart did not show an option to rejoin the game.

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

A big glowy Rejoin button should have obliged me to rejoin the game I crashed from.

Steps to reproduce:

  1. Crash
  2. Restart game
  3. Cry longing for a button

Comments:

Can be very annoying if Unseen just landed a convert on you, cause it looks like a throw or a rage quit while I am simply unable to get back in.error.log (51.1 KB)
